short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download directories, files from Github with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitHub doesn't let you download a single folder from a repository.

How to Download a GitHub Folder or Directory?
Using this extension, it can solve the problem.

How to use?
1. Install the extension
2. Pin it
3. Open the URL: https://github.com/TaskingAI/TaskingAI-Python-Client
4. Click the download icon to download the files or directories
5. Click the "GitHub Directory Download" icon to save the token

PS:
It is better to fill in the Token, otherwise, there will be limitations.

How to create token?
https://github.com/settings/tokens/new

If you have any great ideas, feel free to email me.
